promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical ibex fighting-type pokemon wearing rocky gemstones. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ruinstonehorn, a a gigantic mythical ibex fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Megaton Slap Push. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "fighting" or "Ruinstonehorn". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, ibex-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal mountain dweller loves battles and ruins exploration. Its trademark Megaton Slap decimates obstacles with ease.
